body_html: You have to manually tweak the config script to download the OSX MKL version. The URL is slightly different. Intel did not include that check in the script. I will own this as I want to do the process so I can finish up some benchmarks to include in an updated performance guide. It would be awesome but not necessary if you (@vade) found the URL and updated the config script.

body: You have to manually tweak the config script to download the OSX MKL version.  The URL is slightly different.  Intel did not include that check in the script.  I will own this as I want to do the process so I can finish up some benchmarks to include in an updated performance guide.  It would be awesome but not necessary if you (@vade) found the URL and updated the config script.
